overview: As a full-stack developer, I have been collaborating with a variety of companies including small startups and big communities, which has made him intimately familiar with all the stages of the web lifecycle from the initial architecture to final deployment. Over the past six years, he solved many complex and technical problems with his strong logic and creativity. I communicate complex ideas clearly and accurately and work well in teams of all sizes.
